description.displayText: Selma spreads pure joy when she walks into the room. She is openhearted, easy to talk to, and will love on your kiddos like they were her own. I have a 4 and 2 year old and 3 month old that she has cared for this past year. She also lived with us this past summer and watched both the 4 and 2 year old. Selma took them to parks, libraries, and snuggled them when they needed it. You won't be disappointed!
